sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-registration', templateUrl: './registration.component.html', styleUrls: ['./registration.component.less'] }) export class RegistrationComponent{ //Declare variables for storage firstName: string = ''; lastName: string = ''; fullName: string = ''; onClickRegister(){ this.fullName = "Your full name is " + this.firstName + " " + this.lastName } $scope.doCheckboxVisible = function(selection){ if(selection) } } Bootstrap Example
Register

Please enter your First Name

Please enter your Last Name
